I am not sure I am exactly understanding the notion of scope.  Say I
want to only crawl a specific Host that I have in my seed list.  I
take it I should chose HostScope as my scope of choice.  I did that
and ran a couple of tests, yet it seems the crawler still goes out of
the Host scope to other sites.  Im not sure if it is a link hop issue
that I am not understanding or if the host scope just isn't doing what
I thought it would.  Thoughts?

~chris
